forumNotes.author: screeble
forumNotes.content:
Greetings, We need to flash controller on the several servers with the same firmware and I have the dhcp server with tftp and pxe. The size of firmware is \~4Mb and it can be executed only under dos. The bootable floppy was created. Its size is \~50Mb. So, I have loaded with this floppy and executed afu.exe file but nothing has been done and the system was stopped. [http://xmages.net/st...ad/7be73fae.jpg](http://xmages.net/storage/10/1/0/5/3/upload/7be73fae.jpg "External link") Did someone has the same situation?
Thank you for your suggestions.
